name: Usergrouplist
short_description: Dropdown list of Joomla user groups.

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the field. This must match the name of the query results column that contains the values that will be shown to the user in the drop-down list, unless a different name is specified in the value_field attribute.

properties2.name: label
properties2.description: (mandatory) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the field.

properties11.name: default
properties11.description: (optional) (not translatable) is the usergroup id of the default selection in the dropdown list.

properties3.name: description
properties3.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as a tooltip when the user moves the mouse over the drop-down box.

properties4.name: class
properties4.description: (optional) is a CSS class name for the HTML form field.

properties5.name: layout
properties5.description: (optional) (translatable) is the layout, for example joomla.form.field.list-fancy-select.

properties6.name: size
properties6.description: (optional) is the width of the text box in characters. If omitted the width is determined by the browser. The value of size does not limit the number of characters that may be entered.

properties7.name: required
properties7.description: (optional) is the field required true if yes.

properties8.name: checksuperusergroup
properties8.description: (optional) is boolean to omit Super User groups. Values 1 or 0.

properties9.name: multiple
properties9.description: (optional) If set to multiple then allows more than one usergroup to be selected.

properties10.name: showon
properties10.description: (optional) show this field on the bases of the value in another field. https://joomla.stackexchange.com/a/17682/2166

description: The usergrouplist form field type provides a dropdown list of all available Joomla user groups. It allows selection of a single group from the site's access control system for use in configuration or assignment settings.
